    • Method Detail

      • server

        public final BleServer server()

      • macAddress

        public final String macAddress()

      • failEvent

        public final ServerReconnectFilter.ConnectFailEvent failEvent()
        Returns the ServerReconnectFilter.ConnectFailEvent instance. This will be null if wasSuccess() returns true.

      • wasSuccess

        public final boolean wasSuccess()
        Returns true if a connection was established to the device with macAddress(). At this point, the device is connected, and ready to be communicated with. If this returns false, you can retrieve failure information by calling failEvent().

      • isRetrying

        public final boolean isRetrying()
        Convenience method to check if this connection is going to be retried or not. This simply calls BleServer.is(String, BleServerState), with macAddress(), and BleServerState.RETRYING_CONNECTION.
